episode_summary: In this episode, Kim Rittberg shares strategies for real estate agents to leverage video content to build connection and credibility with clients. She emphasizes the importance of using social media to showcase personal and professional achievements and offers insights into using AI to enhance business operations. The episode provides actionable tips for creating impactful year-end videos and setting effective New Year's resolutions.
